mapper.insert: REPLACE INTO alipay_order (accountingCode, businessCode, orderCode, goodsName, occuredTime, revenueAmount, disbursementAmount, accountBalance) VALUES (#{accountingCode}, #{businessCode}, #{orderCode}, #{goodsName}, #{occuredTime}, #{revenueAmount}, #{disbursementAmount}, #{accountBalance})
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM (SELECT temp.*, `product`.`productCode` AS proproductcode, `product`.`costPrice` FROM (SELECT `alipay_order`.`orderCode` AS aliordercode, `alipay_order`.`occuredTime`, `order_detail`.`orderCode` AS detailordercode, `order_detail`.`quantity`, `order_detail`.`productCode` AS detailproductcode FROM `alipay_order` LEFT OUTER JOIN `order_detail` ON `alipay_order`.`orderCode` = `order_detail`.`orderCode` UNION SELECT `alipay_order`.`orderCode` AS aliordercode, `alipay_order`.`occuredTime`, `order_detail`.`orderCode` AS detailordercode, `order_detail`.`quantity`, `order_detail`.`productCode` AS detailproductcode FROM `alipay_order` RIGHT OUTER JOIN `order_detail` ON `alipay_order`.`orderCode` = `order_detail`.`orderCode`) AS temp LEFT OUTER JOIN `product` ON temp.detailproductcode LIKE CONCAT(`product`.`productCode`,'%') ) AS temp1
WHERE temp1.occuredTime LIKE CONCAT(#{chooseMonth}, '%')
